title: HOUR 2- Herm Edwards 081420
itunes:title: HOUR 2- Herm Edwards 081420
description:
Herm Edwards talks to Dan about how he had to break the news to his team that the season is post poned. Herm says he understands because they have had his players in a bubble, but all bets are off once the student body gets back on campus.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
